name: The Cursed Mansion
description:
The Cursed Mansion is a first-person puzzle game where you play as a mage betrayed by his kingdom and cursed to live forever in his mansion, whose exits have been blocked by other mages. You will then have to flee your mansion, and to do so, you will use your magic to flip the world around you and find a way out of each room.

Have Fun !

Credits

Game Programmer : Da Costa Raphael / Dirion Antoine

Game Designer : Guerif Quentin / Melek Mathieu

Game Artist : Clairville Lilian
